name: Proof_358 — Papaya from Home Garden Shared Among Humans and Dogs MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a moment of shared food consumption within MaMeeFarm, recorded on
19 December 2025 at 11:13 AM (GMT+7).
The image shows fresh papaya harvested directly from the home garden, being prepared and shared among humans and dogs living together in the household. The papaya is cut and divided on simple household plates, reflecting everyday food practices rooted in self-grown produce.
This moment represents more than food preparation. It records resource sharing, subsistence living, and interspecies coexistence within the farm environment. The food is not produced for sale or display, but for immediate consumption by those who live and work together on the land.
Within the DGCP framework, daily nourishment, food sourcing, and sharing behavior are considered valid ground-truth data. This proof captures real-life subsistence activity without staging, enhancement, or narrative construction.
The image is recorded as-is, with an embedded timestamp providing verifiable temporal anchoring and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s real-world data archive.
This proof is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) to ensure long-term traceability and auditability.
DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
